Question: Phino Electric Wire & cable (kunshan) co., ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Phino Electric Wire & Cable (Kunshan) Co., Ltd.

Product: Certified AC power cords, plugs, sockets, plug adaptors, and extension cords for domestic sales and exports.

Features:
- Established in October 2010
- Located at NO.368, Hengchangjing Road, Zhoushi Town, Kunshan City, JiangSu, China
- Shifted from Shanghai factory
- Main products include certified AC power cords, plugs, sockets, plug adaptors, and extension cords
- Focus on product quality assurance and supply electrical wire & cable products for major companies globally
- Compliant with ISO9001:2015, ISO14001:2015, RoHS 2.0, and REACH 1-15-19
- Introduced automation processes to reduce costs and improve product quality
- Directly or indirectly exports more than 80% of products to the Japanese market
- Capacity to produce 40 to 50 million AC power cords a year
Summary_cn:
富诺电线电缆（昆山）有限公司。

产品：经认证的国内销售和出口用交流电源线、插头、插座、插头转换器和延长线。

特点：
- 成立于2010年10月
- 位于江苏省昆山市周市镇恒昌井路368号
- 迁移自上海工厂
- 主要产品包括经认证的交流电源线、插头、插座、插头转换器和延长线
- 专注于产品质量保证，并为全球主要公司供应电线电缆产品
- 符合ISO9001:2015、ISO14001:2015、RoHS 2.0和REACH 1-15-19标准
- 引入自动化流程以降低成本并提高产品质量
- 直接或间接将超过80%的产品出口至日本市场
- 年产能可达4000万至5000万根交流电源线。
